dragonrush.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
dragonrush.name: Dragon Rush

dragontail.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.
dragontail.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.
dragontail.name: Dragon Tail

drainingkiss.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainingkiss.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.
drainingkiss.name: Draining Kiss

drainpunch.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainpunch.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
drainpunch.name: Drain Punch

dreameater.desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
dreameater.shortDesc: User gains 1/2 HP inflicted. Sleeping target only.
dreameater.name: Dream Eater

drillrun.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
drillrun.name: Drill Run

drumbeating.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
drumbeating.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.
drumbeating.name: Drum Beating

dualchop.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
dualchop.name: Dual Chop

dualwingbeat.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
dualwingbeat.name: Dual Wingbeat

dynamaxcannon.shortDesc: Damage doubles if the target is Dynamaxed.
dynamaxcannon.name: Dynamax Cannon

dynamicpunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
dynamicpunch.name: Dynamic Punch

earthpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
earthpower.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
earthpower.name: Earth Power

earthquake.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
earthquake.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dig.
earthquake.name: Earthquake

echoedvoice.desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
echoedvoice.shortDesc: Power increases when used on consecutive turns.
echoedvoice.name: Echoed Voice

eerieimpulse.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages.
eerieimpulse.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 2.
eerieimpulse.name: Eerie Impulse

electricterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain.
electricterrain.name: Electric Terrain

electrify.desc: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Among effects that can change a move's type, this effect happens last. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
electrify.shortDesc: Changes the target's move to Electric this turn.
electrify.name: Electrify

electroball.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1. If the target's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 40.
electroball.shortDesc: More power the faster the user is than the target.
electroball.name: Electro Ball

electroweb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
electroweb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
electroweb.name: Electroweb

embargo.desc: For 5 turns, the target's held item has no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by the target. Items thrown at the target with Fling will still activate for it. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.
embargo.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the target's item has no effect.
embargo.name: Embargo

ember.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
ember.name: Ember

encore.desc: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, if the move is Assist, Copycat, Encore, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, or Transform, or if the target is Dynamaxed.
encore.shortDesc: Target repeats its last move for its next 3 turns.
encore.name: Encore

endeavor.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
endeavor.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.
endeavor.name: Endeavor

endure.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
endure.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.
endure.name: Endure

energyball.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
energyball.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
energyball.name: Energy Ball

entrainment.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become the same as the user's. Fails if the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Truant, or the same Ability as the user, or if the user's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, or Zen Mode.
entrainment.shortDesc: The target's Ability changes to match the user's.
entrainment.name: Entrainment

eruption.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
eruption.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).
eruption.name: Eruption

eternabeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
eternabeam.name: Eternabeam

expandingforce.desc: If the current terrain is Psychic Terrain and the user is grounded, this move hits all opposing Pokemon and has its power multiplied by 1.5.
expandingforce.shortDesc: User on Psychic Terrain: 1.5x power, hits foes.
expandingforce.name: Expanding Force

explosion.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
explosion.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.
explosion.name: Explosion

extrasensory.desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.
extrasensory.name: Extrasensory

extremeevoboost.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages.
extremeevoboost.shortDesc: Raises user's Atk, Def, SpA, SpD, and Spe by 2.
extremeevoboost.name: Extreme Evoboost

facade.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
facade.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.
facade.name: Facade

fairylock.desc: Prevents all active Pokemon from switching next turn. A Pokemon can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. Fails if the effect is already active.
fairylock.shortDesc: Prevents all Pokemon from switching next turn.
fairylock.name: Fairy Lock

fakeout.desc: Has a 100% chance to flinch the target. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
fakeout.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.
fakeout.name: Fake Out

faketears.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
faketears.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.
faketears.name: Fake Tears

falsesurrender.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.
falsesurrender.name: False Surrender

falseswipe.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
falseswipe.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
falseswipe.name: False Swipe

featherdance.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
featherdance.name: Feather Dance

feint.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
feint.shortDesc: Nullifies Detect, Protect, and Quick/Wide Guard.
feint.name: Feint

feintattack.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.
feintattack.name: Feint Attack

fellstinger.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 3 stages if this move knocks out the target.
fellstinger.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack by 3 if this KOes the target.
fellstinger.name: Fell Stinger

fierydance.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
fierydance.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.
fierydance.name: Fiery Dance

finalgambit.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.
finalgambit.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.
finalgambit.name: Final Gambit

fireblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
fireblast.name: Fire Blast

firefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.
firefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.
firefang.name: Fire Fang

firelash.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
firelash.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
firelash.name: Fire Lash

firepledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Grass Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances but does not stack with the Serene Grace Ability. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.
firepledge.shortDesc: Use with Grass or Water Pledge for added effect.
firepledge.name: Fire Pledge

firepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
firepunch.name: Fire Punch

firespin.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
firespin.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
firespin.name: Fire Spin

firstimpression.desc: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
firstimpression.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only.
firstimpression.name: First Impression

fishiousrend.desc: Power doubles if the user moves before the target.
fishiousrend.shortDesc: Power doubles if user moves before the target.
fishiousrend.name: Fishious Rend

fissure.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
fissure.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.
fissure.name: Fissure

flail.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
flail.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.
flail.name: Flail

flameburst.desc: If this move is successful, the target's ally loses 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, unless it has the Magic Guard Ability.
flameburst.shortDesc: Damages Pokemon next to the target as well.
flameburst.name: Flame Burst

flamecharge.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
flamecharge.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.
flamecharge.name: Flame Charge

flamewheel.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamewheel.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.
flamewheel.name: Flame Wheel

flamethrower.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamethrower.name: Flamethrower

flareblitz.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
flareblitz.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.
flareblitz.name: Flare Blitz

flash.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
flash.name: Flash

flashcannon.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
flashcannon.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
flashcannon.name: Flash Cannon

flatter.desc: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.
flatter.shortDesc: Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.
flatter.name: Flatter

fleurcannon.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
fleurcannon.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
fleurcannon.name: Fleur Cannon

fling.desc: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Klutz Ability.
fling.shortDesc: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.
fling.name: Fling

flipturn.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
flipturn.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.
flipturn.name: Flip Turn

floatyfall.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
floatyfall.name: Floaty Fall

floralhealing.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
floralhealing.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.
floralhealing.name: Floral Healing

flowershield.desc: Raises the Defense of all active Grass-type Pokemon by 1 stage. Fails if there are no active Grass-type Pokemon.
flowershield.shortDesc: Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.
flowershield.name: Flower Shield

fly.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
fly.shortDesc: Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.
fly.name: Fly

flyingpress.desc: This move combines Flying in its type effectiveness against the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
flyingpress.shortDesc: Combines Flying in its type effectiveness.
flyingpress.name: Flying Press

focusblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
focusblast.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
focusblast.name: Focus Blast

focusenergy.desc: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
focusenergy.shortDesc: Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.
focusenergy.name: Focus Energy

focuspunch.desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.
focuspunch.shortDesc: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.
focuspunch.name: Focus Punch

followme.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
followme.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.
followme.name: Follow Me

forcepalm.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
forcepalm.name: Force Palm

foresight.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.
foresight.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.
foresight.name: Foresight

forestscurse.desc: Causes the Grass type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Grass type. If Trick-or-Treat adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
forestscurse.shortDesc: Adds Grass to the target's type(s).
forestscurse.name: Forest's Curse

foulplay.desc: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
foulplay.shortDesc: Uses target's Attack stat in damage calculation.
foulplay.name: Foul Play

freezedry.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
freezedry.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.
freezedry.name: Freeze-Dry

freezeshock.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
freezeshock.name: Freeze Shock

freezyfrost.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.
freezyfrost.name: Freezy Frost

frenzyplant.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
frenzyplant.name: Frenzy Plant

frostbreath.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
frostbreath.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.
frostbreath.name: Frost Breath

frustration.desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
frustration.name: Frustration

furyattack.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
furyattack.name: Fury Attack

furycutter.desc: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.
furycutter.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.
furycutter.name: Fury Cutter

furyswipes.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
furyswipes.name: Fury Swipes

fusionbolt.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.
fusionbolt.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare this turn.
fusionbolt.name: Fusion Bolt

fusionflare.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.
fusionflare.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt this turn.
fusionflare.name: Fusion Flare

futuresight.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
futuresight.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.
futuresight.name: Future Sight

gastroacid.desc: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, or Zen Mode, this move fails, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.
gastroacid.name: Gastro Acid

geargrind.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
geargrind.name: Gear Grind

gearup.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
gearup.shortDesc: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.
gearup.name: Gear Up

genesissupernova.desc: If this move is successful, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain.
genesissupernova.name: Genesis Supernova

geomancy.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
geomancy.shortDesc: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.
geomancy.name: Geomancy

gigadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
gigadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
gigadrain.name: Giga Drain

gigaimpact.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
gigaimpact.name: Giga Impact

gigavolthavoc.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
gigavolthavoc.name: Gigavolt Havoc

glaciate.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
glaciate.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
glaciate.name: Glaciate

glitzyglow.desc: This move summons Light Screen for 5 turns upon use.
glitzyglow.name: Glitzy Glow

gmaxbefuddle.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side either falls asleep, becomes poisoned, or becomes paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxbefuddle.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: slp or psn or par.
gmaxbefuddle.name: G-Max Befuddle

gmaxcannonade.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Water-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
gmaxcannonade.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
gmaxcannonade.name: G-Max Cannonade

gmaxcentiferno.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw), even if they have a substitute. Causes damage equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends for a target if it leaves the field, or if it uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
gmaxcentiferno.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.
gmaxcentiferno.name: G-Max Centiferno

gmaxchistrike.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side has their critical hit ratio raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxchistrike.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: Crit Ratio +1.
gmaxchistrike.name: G-Max Chi Strike

gmaxcuddle.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes infatuated, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen for a target if both it and the user are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated.
gmaxcuddle.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: infatuated.
gmaxcuddle.name: G-Max Cuddle

gmaxdepletion.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side loses 2 PP from its last move used, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxdepletion.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: last move -2 PP.
gmaxdepletion.name: G-Max Depletion

gmaxdrumsolo.desc: This move will always have 160 Base Power, and it ignores the abilities of opposing Pokemon.
gmaxdrumsolo.shortDesc: Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.
gmaxdrumsolo.name: G-Max Drum Solo

gmaxfinale.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/6 of its current maximum HP, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxfinale.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1/6 max HP.
gmaxfinale.name: G-Max Finale

gmaxfireball.desc: This move will always have 160 Base Power, and it ignores the abilities of opposing Pokemon.
gmaxfireball.shortDesc: Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.
gmaxfireball.name: G-Max Fireball

gmaxfoamburst.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 2 stages, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxfoamburst.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -2 Speed.
gmaxfoamburst.name: G-Max Foam Burst

gmaxgoldrush.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes confused, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxgoldrush.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: confused.
gmaxgoldrush.name: G-Max Gold Rush

gmaxgravitas.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Gravity begins.
gmaxgravitas.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Gravity.
gmaxgravitas.name: G-Max Gravitas

gmaxhydrosnipe.desc: This move will always have 160 Base Power, and it ignores the abilities of opposing Pokemon.
gmaxhydrosnipe.shortDesc: Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.
gmaxhydrosnipe.name: G-Max Hydrosnipe

gmaxmalodor.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes poisoned, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxmalodor.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: poisoned.
gmaxmalodor.name: G-Max Malodor

gmaxmeltdown.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Torment begins for each Pokemon on the opposing side, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxmeltdown.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: Tormented.
gmaxmeltdown.name: G-Max Meltdown

gmaxoneblow.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful and any Pokemon on the opposing side is using Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Mat Block, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, or Spiky Shield, this move will fully break the protection.
gmaxoneblow.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Breaks all protection.
gmaxoneblow.name: G-Max One Blow

gmaxrapidflow.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful and any Pokemon on the opposing side is using Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Mat Block, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, or Spiky Shield, this move will fully break the protection.
gmaxrapidflow.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Breaks all protection.
gmaxrapidflow.name: G-Max Rapid Flow

gmaxreplenish.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, there is a 50% chance every Pokemon on the user's side has its Berry restored, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxreplenish.shortDesc: Base move affects power. 50% restores Berries.
gmaxreplenish.name: G-Max Replenish

gmaxresonance.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Aurora Veil begins on the user's side.
gmaxresonance.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: Aurora Veil.
gmaxresonance.name: G-Max Resonance

gmaxsandblast.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw), even if they have a substitute. Causes damage equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends for a target if it leaves the field, or if it uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
gmaxsandblast.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.
gmaxsandblast.name: G-Max Sandblast

gmaxsmite.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes confused, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxsmite.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: confused.
gmaxsmite.name: G-Max Smite

gmaxsnooze.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, there is a 50% chance the effect of Yawn begins on the target, even if it has a substitute.
gmaxsnooze.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Target: 50% Yawn.
gmaxsnooze.name: G-Max Snooze

gmaxsteelsurge.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Steel type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
gmaxsteelsurge.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: Steel hazard.
gmaxsteelsurge.name: G-Max Steelsurge

gmaxstonesurge.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
gmaxstonesurge.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: Stealth Rock.
gmaxstonesurge.name: G-Max Stonesurge

gmaxstunshock.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side either becomes poisoned or paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxstunshock.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: psn or par.
gmaxstunshock.name: G-Max Stun Shock

gmaxsweetness.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side has its status condition cured, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxsweetness.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: status cured.
gmaxsweetness.name: G-Max Sweetness

gmaxtartness.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the evasiveness of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxtartness.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 evasiveness.
gmaxtartness.name: G-Max Tartness

gmaxterror.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching out, even if they have a substitute. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If a target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
gmaxterror.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: trapped.
gmaxterror.name: G-Max Terror

gmaxvinelash.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Grass-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
gmaxvinelash.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
gmaxvinelash.name: G-Max Vine Lash

gmaxvolcalith.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Rock-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
gmaxvolcalith.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
gmaxvolcalith.name: G-Max Volcalith

gmaxvoltcrash.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxvoltcrash.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: paralyzed.
gmaxvoltcrash.name: G-Max Volt Crash

gmaxwildfire.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Fire-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
gmaxwildfire.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
gmaxwildfire.name: G-Max Wildfire

gmaxwindrage.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain end, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, G-Max Steelsurge, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of G-Max Steelsurge, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side.
gmaxwindrage.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Ends Terrain, hazards.
gmaxwindrage.name: G-Max Wind Rage

grassknot.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
grassknot.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.
grassknot.name: Grass Knot

grasspledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
grasspledge.shortDesc: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.
grasspledge.name: Grass Pledge

grasswhistle.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
grasswhistle.name: Grass Whistle

grassyglide.desc: If the current terrain is Grassy Terrain and the user is grounded, this move has its priority increased by 1.
grassyglide.name: Grassy Glide

grassyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.
grassyterrain.name: Grassy Terrain

gravapple.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Power is multiplied by 1.5 during Gravity's effect.
gravapple.name: Grav Apple

gravity.desc: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.
gravity.name: Gravity

growl.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
growl.name: Growl

growth.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land, this move raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella, this move will only raise the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage, even if the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land.
growth.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.
growth.name: Growth

grudge.desc: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP.
grudge.shortDesc: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.
grudge.name: Grudge

guardianofalola.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to 3/4 of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
guardianofalola.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.
guardianofalola.name: Guardian of Alola

guardsplit.desc: The user and the target have their Defense and Special Defense stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Defense and Special Defense stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
guardsplit.shortDesc: Averages Defense and Sp. Def stats with target.
guardsplit.name: Guard Split

guardswap.desc: The user swaps its Defense and Special Defense stat stage changes with the target.
guardswap.shortDesc: Swaps Defense and Sp. Def changes with target.
guardswap.name: Guard Swap

guillotine.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
guillotine.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.
guillotine.name: Guillotine

gunkshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
gunkshot.name: Gunk Shot

gust.desc: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
gust.shortDesc: Power doubles during Bounce, Fly, and Sky Drop.
gust.name: Gust

gyroball.desc: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed) + 1, rounded down, but not more than 150. If the user's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 1.
gyroball.shortDesc: More power the slower the user than the target.
gyroball.name: Gyro Ball

hail.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.
hail.name: Hail

hammerarm.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.
hammerarm.name: Hammer Arm

harden.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.
harden.name: Harden

haze.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.
haze.name: Haze

headbutt.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
headbutt.name: Headbutt

headcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
headcharge.name: Head Charge

headsmash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
headsmash.name: Head Smash

healbell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
healbell.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.
healbell.name: Heal Bell

healblock.desc: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
healblock.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.
healblock.name: Heal Block

healingwish.desc: The user faints and the next injured or statused Pokemon brought in has its HP fully restored along with having any major status condition cured. The healing happens before hazards take effect. Is not consumed if the Pokemon sent out is not injured or statused. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
healingwish.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.
healingwish.name: Healing Wish

healorder.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
healorder.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.
healorder.name: Heal Order

healpulse.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Mega Launcher Ability, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
healpulse.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.
healpulse.name: Heal Pulse

heartstamp.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
heartstamp.name: Heart Stamp

heartswap.desc: The user swaps all its stat stage changes with the target.
heartswap.shortDesc: Swaps all stat changes with target.
heartswap.name: Heart Swap

heatcrash.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heatcrash.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.
heatcrash.name: Heat Crash

heatwave.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
heatwave.name: Heat Wave

heavyslam.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heavyslam.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.
heavyslam.name: Heavy Slam

helpinghand.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
helpinghand.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.
helpinghand.name: Helping Hand

hex.desc: Power doubles if the target has a major status condition.
hex.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.
hex.name: Hex

hiddenpower.desc: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
hiddenpower.shortDesc: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.
hiddenpower.name: Hidden Power

highjumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
highjumpkick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.
highjumpkick.name: High Jump Kick

holdback.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
holdback.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
holdback.name: Hold Back

holdhands.desc: No competitive use. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
holdhands.name: Hold Hands

honeclaws.desc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1 stage.
honeclaws.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1.
honeclaws.name: Hone Claws

horndrill.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
horndrill.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.
horndrill.name: Horn Drill

hornleech.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
hornleech.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
hornleech.name: Horn Leech

howl.desc: Raises the Attack of the user and all allies 1 stage.
howl.shortDesc: Raises the user's and ally's Attack by 1.
howl.name: Howl

hurricane.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
hurricane.shortDesc: 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.
hurricane.name: Hurricane

hydrocannon.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
hydrocannon.name: Hydro Cannon

hydrovortex.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
hydrovortex.name: Hydro Vortex

hyperbeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
hyperbeam.name: Hyper Beam

hyperfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.
hyperfang.name: Hyper Fang

hyperspacefury.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Hoopa Unbound. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacefury.shortDesc: Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protect.
hyperspacefury.name: Hyperspace Fury

hyperspacehole.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacehole.shortDesc: Breaks the target's protection for this turn.
hyperspacehole.name: Hyperspace Hole

hypervoice.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
hypervoice.name: Hyper Voice

hypnosis.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
hypnosis.name: Hypnosis

iceball.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn. If this move hits an active Disguise during the effect, the power multiplier is paused but the turn counter is not, potentially allowing the multiplier to be used on the user's next move after this effect ends.
iceball.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.
iceball.name: Ice Ball

icebeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
icebeam.name: Ice Beam

iceburn.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
iceburn.name: Ice Burn

icefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.
icefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. 10% chance to flinch.
icefang.name: Ice Fang

icehammer.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.
icehammer.name: Ice Hammer

icepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
icepunch.name: Ice Punch

iciclecrash.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
iciclecrash.name: Icicle Crash

iciclespear.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
iciclespear.name: Icicle Spear

icywind.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
icywind.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
icywind.name: Icy Wind

imprison.desc: The user prevents all opposing Pokemon from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active.
imprison.shortDesc: No foe can use any move known by the user.
imprison.name: Imprison

incinerate.desc: The target loses its held item if it is a Berry or a Gem. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
incinerate.name: Incinerate

inferno.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.
inferno.name: Inferno

infernooverdrive.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
infernooverdrive.name: Inferno Overdrive

infestation.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
infestation.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
infestation.name: Infestation

ingrain.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.
ingrain.shortDesc: Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.
ingrain.name: Ingrain

instruct.desc: The target immediately uses its last used move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, if the target is preparing to use Beak Blast, Focus Punch, or Shell Trap, or if the move is Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Celebrate, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Ice Ball, Instruct, King's Shield, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Outrage, Petal Dance, Rollout, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Thrash, Transform, Uproar, any two-turn move, any recharge move, or any Z-Move.
instruct.shortDesc: The target immediately uses its last used move.
instruct.name: Instruct

iondeluge.desc: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn. The effect happens after other effects that change a move's type.
iondeluge.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.
iondeluge.name: Ion Deluge

irondefense.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
irondefense.name: Iron Defense

ironhead.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
ironhead.name: Iron Head

irontail.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
irontail.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
irontail.name: Iron Tail

jawlock.desc: Prevents the user and the target from switching out. The user and the target can still switch out if either of them is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.
jawlock.shortDesc: Prevents both user and target from switching out.
jawlock.name: Jaw Lock

judgment.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Plate.
judgment.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Plate.
judgment.name: Judgment

jumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
jumpkick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.
jumpkick.name: Jump Kick

junglehealing.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
junglehealing.shortDesc: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.
junglehealing.name: Jungle Healing

karatechop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
karatechop.name: Karate Chop

kinesis.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
kinesis.name: Kinesis

kingsshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
kingsshield.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Atk.
kingsshield.name: King's Shield

knockoff.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
knockoff.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.
knockoff.name: Knock Off

landswrath.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
landswrath.name: Land's Wrath

laserfocus.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the user's attacks will be critical hits.
laserfocus.shortDesc: Until the end of the next turn, user's moves crit.
laserfocus.name: Laser Focus

lashout.desc: Power doubles if the user had a stat stage lowered this turn.
lashout.shortDesc: 2x power if the user had a stat lowered this turn.
lashout.name: Lash Out

lastresort.desc: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.
lastresort.shortDesc: Fails unless each known move has been used.
lastresort.name: Last Resort

lavaplume.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
lavaplume.name: Lava Plume

leafblade.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
leafblade.name: Leaf Blade

leafstorm.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
leafstorm.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
leafstorm.name: Leaf Storm

leaftornado.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
leaftornado.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.
leaftornado.name: Leaf Tornado

leechlife.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
leechlife.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
leechlife.name: Leech Life

leechseed.desc: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Rapid Spin successfully, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.
leechseed.shortDesc: 1/8 of target's HP is restored to user every turn.
leechseed.name: Leech Seed

leer.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.
leer.name: Leer

lick.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
lick.name: Lick

lifedew.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
lifedew.shortDesc: Heals the user and its allies by 1/4 their max HP.
lifedew.name: Life Dew

lightofruin.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
lightofruin.name: Light of Ruin

lightscreen.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
lightscreen.shortDesc: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.
lightscreen.name: Light Screen

lightthatburnsthesky.desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
lightthatburnsthesky.shortDesc: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.
lightthatburnsthesky.name: Light That Burns the Sky

liquidation.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
liquidation.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
liquidation.name: Liquidation

lockon.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
lockon.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.
lockon.name: Lock-On

lovelykiss.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
lovelykiss.name: Lovely Kiss

lowkick.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
lowkick.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.
lowkick.name: Low Kick

lowsweep.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
lowsweep.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.
lowsweep.name: Low Sweep

luckychant.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot be struck by a critical hit. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
luckychant.shortDesc: For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.
luckychant.name: Lucky Chant

lunardance.desc: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP and PP fully restored along with having any major status condition cured. The new Pokemon is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
lunardance.shortDesc: User faints. Replacement is fully healed, with PP.
lunardance.name: Lunar Dance

lunge.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
lunge.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.
lunge.name: Lunge

lusterpurge.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
lusterpurge.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
lusterpurge.name: Luster Purge

magicalleaf.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.
magicalleaf.name: Magical Leaf

magiccoat.desc: Until the end of the turn, the user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. Moves reflected in this way are unable to be reflected again by this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes can only be reflected once per side, by the leftmost Pokemon under this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. The Lightning Rod and Storm Drain Abilities redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.
magiccoat.name: Magic Coat

magicpowder.desc: Causes the target to become a Psychic type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, or if the target is already purely Psychic type.
magicpowder.shortDesc: Changes the target's type to Psychic.
magicpowder.name: Magic Powder

magicroom.desc: For 5 turns, the held items of all active Pokemon have no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
magicroom.shortDesc: For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.
magicroom.name: Magic Room

magmastorm.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
magmastorm.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
magmastorm.name: Magma Storm

magnetbomb.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.
magnetbomb.name: Magnet Bomb

magneticflux.desc: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
magneticflux.shortDesc: Raises Def, Sp. Def of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

magnetrise.desc: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
magnetrise.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.

magnitude.desc: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.

matblock.desc: The user and its party members are protected from damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field, if the user moves last this turn, or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.

maxairstream.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.

maxquake.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Defense of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.
maxquake.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Def.

maxrockfall.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Sandstorm begins.

maxstarfall.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Misty Terrain begins.
maxstarfall.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Misty Terrain.

maxsteelspike.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Defense of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.
maxsteelspike.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Defense.

maxstrike.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.

meanlook.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

megadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
megadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's attack this turn.
metalburst.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

metalclaw.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.

meteorbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

metronome.desc: A random move is selected for use, other than After You, Apple Acid, Assist, Aura Wheel, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Bestow, Body Press, Branch Poke, Breaking Swipe, Celebrate, Chatter, Clangorous Soul, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Decorate, Destiny Bond, Detect, Diamond Storm, Double Iron Bash, Dragon Ascent, Drum Beating, Dynamax Cannon, Endure, Eternabeam, False Surrender, Feint, Fleur Cannon, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Freeze Shock, Grav Apple, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Hyperspace Fury, Hyperspace Hole, Ice Burn, Instruct, King's Shield, Life Dew, Light of Ruin, Mat Block, Me First, Meteor Assault, Metronome, Mimic, Mind Blown, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Moongeist Beam, Nature Power, Nature's Madness, Obstruct, Origin Pulse, Overdrive, Photon Geyser, Plasma Fists, Precipice Blades, Protect, Pyro Ball, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Powder, Relic Song, Secret Sword, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snap Trap, Snarl, Snatch, Snore, Spectral Thief, Spiky Shield, Spirit Break, Spotlight, Steam Eruption, Steel Beam, Strange Steam, Struggle, Sunsteel Strike, Switcheroo, Techno Blast, Thief, Thousand Arrows, Thousand Waves, Transform, Trick, V-create, or Wide Guard.

mindblown.desc: Whether or not this move is successful and even if it would cause fainting, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability. minimize.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. miracleeye.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Odor Sleuth.

If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.

mirrormove.desc: The user uses the last move used by the target. The copied move is used against that target, if possible. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the last move used cannot be copied by this move.

mistball.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

mistyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain.

nightmare.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.

octolock.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. At the end of each turn during effect, the target's Defense and Special Defense are lowered by 1 stage. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

odorsleuth.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.

originpulse.name: Origin Pulse

outrage.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

paraboliccharge.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

partingshot.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.
partingshot.shortDesc: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.
partingshot.name: Parting Shot

payback.desc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target this turn, including actions taken through Instruct or the Dancer Ability. Switching in does not count as an action.
payback.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target.
payback.name: Payback

perishsong.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
perishsong.shortDesc: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.
perishsong.name: Perish Song

petalblizzard.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.
petalblizzard.name: Petal Blizzard

petaldance.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
petaldance.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.
petaldance.name: Petal Dance

phantomforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
phantomforce.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.
phantomforce.name: Phantom Force

photongeyser.desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
photongeyser.shortDesc: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.
photongeyser.name: Photon Geyser

pikapapow.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
pikapapow.name: Pika Papow

pinmissile.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
pinmissile.name: Pin Missile

plasmafists.desc: If this move is successful, causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.name: Plasma Fists

playnice.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
playnice.name: Play Nice

playrough.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
playrough.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.
playrough.name: Play Rough

pluck.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
pluck.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.
pluck.name: Pluck

poisonfang.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.name: Poison Fang

poisonjab.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poisonjab.name: Poison Jab

poisonsting.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poisonsting.name: Poison Sting

poisontail.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
poisontail.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.
poisontail.name: Poison Tail

pollenpuff.desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
pollenpuff.shortDesc: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.
pollenpuff.name: Pollen Puff

poltergeist.shortDesc: Fails if the target has no held item.
poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
